item.title: The Cloud API Services Revolution
item.description: Photo Source: Pixabay. Creative Commons Recent promotion of Cloud API services by the dominant Internet service providers can lead to a substantial change in the use of legacy systems and technologies. Cloud-based services, which enable high-value-added interactions with voice, natural language, artificial intelligence, etc., will make it possible to leave existing solutions behind. More Efficient and Cost-Saving. Google, Amazon, Apple and Microsoft are starting to provide amazing cloud-based services to enterprises, which were just available to developers until now.
